SEARCH

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Rectangle, Triangle
public abstract class Shape extends Object
Abstract base class for all shapes that can be manipulated and drawn on a canvas. This class contains common behavior shared by all geometric shapes.
Version:
3.0 (October 2025)
Author:
Refactored for Silk Road Project - Ciclo 1, 2, 3

  • Method Details

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make this shape visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      Make this shape invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

      Abstract method to draw the shape - must be implemented by subclasses

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(String newColor)
      Change the color.
      Parameters:
      newColor - the new color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta", "cyan", "orange", "pink", "gray", "darkGray", "lightGray", "white", and "black".

    • getXPosition

      public int getXPosition()
      Get the current x position of the shape.
      Returns:
      The x position in pixels

      Get the current y position of the shape.
      Returns:
      The y position in pixels

    • getColor

      public String getColor()
      Get the current color of the shape.
      Returns:
      The color as a string

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Check if the shape is currently visible.
      Returns:
      true if visible, false otherwise

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int x, int y)
      Set the position of the shape directly.
      Parameters:
      x - The new x position
      y - The new y position

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(int newX, int newY)
      Move the shape to a specific position.
      Parameters:
      newX - The target x position
      newY - The target y position

    • scale

      public abstract void scale(double factor)
      Scale the shape by a factor - must be implemented by subclasses
      Parameters:
      factor - The scaling factor (1.0 = no change, 2.0 = double size, 0.5 = half size)

    • copy

      public abstract Shape copy()
      Create a copy of this shape - must be implemented by subclasses
      Returns:
      A new Shape object with the same properties

    • getArea

      public abstract double getArea()
      Calculate the area of the shape - must be implemented by subclasses
      Returns:
      The area of the shape

    • contains

      public abstract boolean contains(int x, int y)
      Check if a point is inside the shape - must be implemented by subclasses
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the point
      y - The y coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point is inside the shape
